name: Christine aka My Love
wishText: It is March 18 and you know what that means!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! May all your wishes come true!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised that was boring and I wanted to do something special
outroText: Did you like your birthday surprise?
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
